name: GGWater
author: tekkeun
notes: So this was itsyoboyedens list for the mcs I used it to get kog this season it was prettyy easy! It's such a strong deck. The main problem with ssa builds was getting otked or having no way to get an ssa or alo back on the field with this deck it was very easy because of the gy synergy. If you get grass + feast combo out it's gg mostly everyone quit when that happened. I went 20-3 from leg1-kog. The real list has a moray in there I put the snake.
